title: A Comprehensive Study On Medical Image Security Algorithms
abstract: With the technological developments, remote consultation and diagnosis have become a significant part of smart medical services. Medical data is considered the input for a smart health service environment. Medical records are frequently transferred and exchanged between hospitals and research com-munities worldwide through the internet and other communication mechanisms. Medical images form a substantial share of medical data. Thus, a tremendous amount of medical images are available in a structured and unstructured manner. For easy and timely access, medical images prefer to store in cloud-based environments. Many image outbreaks have been reported in the cloud-based structure in the last decade. Hence, the above outbreaks brought the attention of the research community to developing new cloud-based security frameworks and adopting improved security algorithms for clinical images. Therefore, in this paper, the authors classify available medical image security algorithms based on adopted methodologies.
venue: 2022 Third International Conference on Intelligent Computing Instrumentation and Control Technologies (ICICICT)

journal.name: 2022 Third International Conference on Intelligent Computing Instrumentation and Control Technologies (ICICICT)

citations.title: An XOR-based Multiple Medical Image Sharing using Visual Secret Sharing
